## FlyoutButtonNavigationPolicy.getParent() method

Returns the parent workspace of the given flyout button.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getParent(current: FlyoutButton): IFocusableNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  current | [FlyoutButton](./blockly.flyoutbutton.md) | The FlyoutButton instance to navigate from. |

**Returns:**

[IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode.md) \| null

The given flyout button's parent workspace.
